casebody.data:
State
v.
Mason White Hyde 88P15-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016

Mr. Mason W. Hyde, Laurinburg, Pro Se.

*517Mr. James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Hyde, Mason White.

Ms. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of October 2016 by Defendant for Objection:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
